byline.original: By QUOCTRUNG BUI and CLAIRE CAIN MILLER

lead_paragraph: There are many more black and Hispanic students majoring in computer science and engineering than work in tech jobs. So why aren’t they being hired?

headline.main: Why Tech Degrees Are Not Putting More Blacks and Hispanics Into Tech Jobs
headline.print_headline: There Are More Black and Hispanic Engineers Than Get Hired. What’s Going On?

snippet: There are many more black and Hispanic students majoring in computer science and engineering than work in tech jobs. So why aren’t they being hired?
